name: Fact or Fiction
description:
Fact or Fiction is a web platform that extracts objective statements in text documents to foster constructive conversations. We trained the models from our hand-labeled data from various news sources.
 Submitted paper to Computer-Supported Cooperative Work and Social Computing(CSCW) 2018 as a primary author.

name: Alcogait
description: Alcogait is an Android app that detects BAC level from human walking movement and sends warning signals to drunk users. Designed and built the web service backend in Flask. Collaborated with the research group to integrate ML classifiers.

name: See You Monday
description: See You Monday is a personalized job searching tool that takes in a resume and returns a short list of tailored jobs for each user. We crawled postings from Monsters and calculated match score between the postings and the resume with Jaccard Similarity.

name: Unicorn.io
description: Submitted to TreeHacks at Stanford. Our website aims to address the pain points for job seekers to find startup companies that do not have postings on the popular job posting websites such as Indeed or Glassdoor. Unicorn.io scrapes company data from Crunchbase and evalues the companies, then find the most suitable matches for you.

name: Elevate
description: Submitted to HackMIT. Stocks and investments can be intimidating. We created a messenger app that hooks up to Robinhood and trade stocks for you via chat.

name: site
description: This website! This is a collaboration to build a reactive and clean personal website that is easily extensible.

name: Jane
description: A *life-like* messenger chatbot that can tell you the weather, tell your original stories, call you on your phone, and play games! (Currently private only.) Created during Hack@WPI 2017.

name: Data Mining: Clustering and Graphs
description: Implemented PageRank and Spectral Clustering methods to cluster Yelp social network data.

name: Data Mining: Reinforcement Learning
description: Created a neural network to play Atari PacMan with RL and backpropagation with Python and numpy. Techniques attempted were rather straightforward and training minimal, but there was some signal.

name: Webware: THEIA: Yelp Dataset Visualization
description: Cooperated in small team to build THEIA; a platform for Yelp (restaurant) data comprehension. By offering interactive visualizations that capture the patterns of immense datasets, THEIA supplies a visual context. This work utilizes tree map, bubble chart, and zoomable area.

name: AI for Interactive Media: Competitive Programatic Soccer Team
description: Created a team of bots to play soccer together, and compete in a tournament. Enabled bots to calculate trajectories of bounced balls, and coordinate while balancing the tradeoff of CPU usage and performance.

name: Artificial Intelligence: Search
description: Implemented the Expectation Maximization algorithm for an unknown number of models. Implemented iterative deepening, A*, genetic, and simulated annealing algorithms to solve constrained arithmetic problems. Given a limited number of operators and operands, the target was to reach a certain number.

name: Artificial Intelligence: Deep Neural Network
description: Implemented simple neural network, deep neural network, and convolutational network using TensorFlow to recognize hand-written alpha-numericals from MNIST and notMNIST datasets. Compared and explored the accuracy of different neural networks by tuning the parameters, adding noise to the dataset, and testing on customized hand-drawn examples.

name: Software Engineering: goatThere()
description: Worked in a 7-person team, built backend for a desktop app to find the way between locations at WPI. Played the role of Product Owner and Test Engineer, facilitating user stories, burn-down and quality assurance.

name: Advancing Namibian Higher Education: Promoting the Debut of MOOCs
description: This project aided the Teaching and Learning Unit at the Namibia University of Science and Technology (NUST), in Windhoek, Namibia, in promoting the launch of two Massive Open Online Courses at the universityâ€“the first such initiative in Namibia, contributing to a 160% increase in enrolled students.
